snippet: After a revamped selection process, Martina Arroyo and Carlos Santana join Herbie Hancock, Billy Joel and Shirley MacLaine in this year’s selections.
abstract: Musicians Herbie Hancock, Billy Joel, Martina Arroyo and actress Shirley McLaine will receive John F Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts'  36th annual award for lifetime achievement; honorees, which include two Latinos, are first class of recipients since Kennedy Center revamped its selection process in response to criticism.
lead_paragraph: After a revamped selection process, Martina Arroyo and Carlos Santana join Herbie Hancock, Billy Joel and Shirley MacLaine in this year’s selections.

headline.main: Latinos Among New Kennedy Center Honorees
headline.print_headline: Latinos Among New Kennedy Center Honorees

keywords.value: Kennedy, John F, Center for the Performing Arts
keywords.name: organizations
